gen_testdata -cen 2023-12-31 -tz +10:30 -radius 7 -tmplt template.json data.json

cmp stdout want.json

[afk.afk]
src = """
{
	"bucket": bucket,
	"data":   data,
}
"""

{
	"bucket": bucket,
	"data":   {
		"activity": data.locked ? "locked" : "not-locked",
		"afk":      data.locked,
	},
}
"""
